conjecture: There exists a universal constant c > 0 such that for every graph G = (V, E) and every epsilon in (0,1), the vertex set V contains an epsilon-light subset S of size at least c * epsilon * |V|, where S is epsilon-light means epsilon*L - L_S is positive semidefinite (L = Laplacian of G, L_S = Laplacian of induced subgraph on S).
author: Daniel Spielman
